hero.heading: Preview your Mobi catalog in minutes
hero.subheading: This tenant shows how Mobi Forge renders live catalog, product detail, and search views using your MobiCMS data.

overview.title: What you can try
overview.description: Navigate the catalog, open any product, or run a search to see how Mobi Forge renders real storefront data fetched from the MobiCMS API.

items.title: Browse the catalog
items.description: Loads the furniture collection from the MobiCMS furnitures endpoint and renders cards with pricing and imagery.

items.title: Search for a product
items.description: Passes your query directly to the API and displays the returned matches in the shared product card layout.

items.title: Inspect a product page
items.description: Each catalog result links to a dedicated product view that reads specifications, gallery, and pricing from the API response.
